cast.name: 普伦蒂斯·佩尼 Prentice Penny

introduction: Creator and host Prentice Penny embarks on a journey to demystify what it takes to live an upscale life, exploring a variety of topics ranging from food and drinks to travel and fashion. From buying a better bottle of wine to getting a custom-made suit for less than some off-the-rack options.S1 E1 RomanceS1 E2 CookingS1 E3 Entertaining at HomeS1 E4 Health & WellnessS1 E5 Dressing UpS1 E6 Date NightS1 E7 ApologiesS1 E8 Gift GivingS1 E9 Day OffS1 E10 SummerS1 E11 TravelS1 E12 Work DayProduction company: Defy Media
